00027 #include <stdio.h>
00028 #include <stdlib.h>
00029 #include <string.h>
00030 #include <unistd.h>
00031 #include <math.h>
00032 
00033 #include "freenect_internal.h"
00034 // The kinect can tilt from +31 to -31 degrees in what looks like 1 degree increments
00035 // The control input looks like 2*desired_degrees
00036 const double MAX_TILT_ANGLE = 31;
00037 const double MIN_TILT_ANGLE = -31;
00038 
00039 
00040 int freenect_set_tilt_in_degrees(freenect_device *dev, double angle)
00041 {
00042   int ret;
00043   uint8_t empty[0x1];
00044   angle = (((angle<MIN_TILT_ANGLE)?MIN_TILT_ANGLE:angle)>MAX_TILT_ANGLE)?MAX_TILT_ANGLE:((angle<MIN_TILT_ANGLE)?MIN_TILT_ANGLE:angle);
00045   angle = angle * 2;
00046   ret = fnusb_control(&dev->usb_motor, 0x40, 0x31, (uint16_t)angle, 0x0, empty, 0x0);
00047   return ret;
00048 
00049 }
00050 
00051 int freenect_set_tilt_in_radians(freenect_device *dev, double angle)
00052 {
00053   int ret;
00054   angle = angle/M_PI*180;
00055   ret = freenect_set_tilt_in_degrees(dev,angle);
00056   return ret;
00057 
00058 }
00059 
00060 int freenect_set_led(freenect_device *dev, freenect_led_options option)
00061 {
00062   int ret;
00063   uint8_t empty[0x1];
00064   ret = fnusb_control(&dev->usb_motor, 0x40, 0x06, (uint16_t)option, 0x0, empty, 0x0);
00065   return ret;
00066 
00067 }
